Class Company

  • java.lang.Object
    • Company

  • public class Company
extends java.lang.Object
    A company is a container for agents, termed employees. A company also has its number of minorities a property, and an optional limited static capacity (same for all companies).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Company()
      Creates a company with no employees.

    • Method Summary

      Remove the ith oldest employee from the company.

      Remove a specified employee from the company.

      • setCapacity

        public static void setCapacity(int capacity)
        Limit the capacity of all companies.

      • addEmployee

        public boolean addEmployee(Person employee)
        Add one employee to the company.
        Parameters:
        employee - the agent to add
        Returns:
        whether employee could be added (within capacity constraint)

      • removeEmployee

        public boolean removeEmployee(Person employee)
        Remove a specified employee from the company.
        Parameters:
        employee - the agent to remove
        Returns:
        whether employee existed and could be removed

      • removeEmployee

        public boolean removeEmployee(int i)
        Remove the ith oldest employee from the company.
        Parameters:
        i - the number of the agent to remove
        Returns:
        whether company had at least i employees

      • getSize

        public int getSize()
        Returns:

      • getMinorities

        Returns:
        number of minority employees

      • getDiversity

        public double getDiversity()
        Returns:
        fraction of minority employees

      • hasCapacity

        public boolean hasCapacity()
        Returns:
        whether company has capacity for at least one more employee
